attributes.action: remove the 3 year residency rule in Rugby Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the 3 year residency rule makes a mockery of international representation. international representation is already watered down enough with spurious family members allowing represenation. why should a 35 year old player, who has lived in uk for 3 years only be able to represent that country
